mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `letter` SET regDate = NOW(), fromMemberId = #{loginedMemberId}, toMemberId = #{toId}, body = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT L.*, IFNULL(M.loginId ,'존재하지 않는 사용자') AS writer FROM `letter` AS L LEFT OUTER JOIN `member` AS M ON M.id = L.fromMemberId AND M.delStatus != TRUE WHERE toMemberId = #{loginedMemberId} AND L.delStatus = FALSE ORDER BY L.id DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM letter WHERE toMemberId = #{loginedMemberId} AND delStatus = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report SET regDate = NOW(), relId = #{relId}, relType = #{relType}, `body` = #{body}, memberId = #{loginedMemberId}
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, A.id AS articleId, A.boardId, AR.articleId AS AR_articleId , AR.boardId AS AR_boardId, IFNULL(M.loginId, '존재하지 않는 사용자') AS writer FROM report AS R LEFT OUTER JOIN article AS A ON R.relType = 'article' AND R.relId = A.id LEFT OUTER JOIN articleReply AS AR ON R.relType = 'reply' AND R.relId = AR.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `member` AS M ON M.id = R.memberId ORDER BY R.id DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{perPageNum}
